ai_summary.Response: This commit updates the `docfx.json` configuration file to reassign document managers for several sections, including `external-id`, `fundamentals`, `global-secure-access`, `id-governance`, `id-protection`, `identity`, `identity/saas-apps`, `identity/enterprise-apps`, `identity-platform`, `permissions-management`, `verified-id`, and `workload-id`. Additionally, the `index.yml` file has been modified to update the last modified date, introduce a new highlight for "Security Copilot + Microsoft Entra" with a corresponding image file, and update the "Learn more" section to link to the "Zero Trust guidance center" instead of the previous "Security Copilot in Microsoft Entra" entry.
